DrugName: Pain reliever such as acetaminophen (Tylenol) or ibuprofen (Advil)
Topical antibiotic ointment to prevent infection on the scalp laceration
Oral antibiotics such as cephalexin (Keflex) if there are signs of infection
Pain management medication such as tramadol (Ultram) if necessary
Muscle relaxant such as cyclobenzaprine (Flexeril) for muscle spasms from the hematoma and minor injury
Vitamin D supplements to address potential nutritional deficiencies due to the vertebral compression fracture
